Here is the elevator pitch for PREVENT-IA:

"Imagine a workplace where employees are empowered with the knowledge and skills to prevent accidents and stay safe. PREVENT-IA is an AI-powered education platform that makes it happen. With our cutting-edge technology, we provide on-site training access, personalized learning paths, and real-time tracking of training outcomes. Unlike traditional training methods, PREVENT-IA uses AI to adapt to your workers' needs, ensuring they receive the right training at the right time. By reducing the number of workplace accidents, we're not just improving safety - we're improving lives. Join the PREVENT-IA revolution and take the first step towards a safer, more productive workplace."
